column4: I got java working on debian without problems, I installed a java vm and created the symlinks as described and lo and behold it worked :)

Java alone works on my system, too. My problem seems to be the RealPlayer10. It is not listed in the installed plugins. Joining a site, where RealPlayer is necessary I get a white field and together with Java the browser crashes.
its absolutely possible that the plugin is not of the best quality, the browser might have bugs too..
ok. Perhaps I`ll try the 0.93-version. This worked well. Nevertheless the rest of this preview runs perfect. Thx
